text:
I guess I have to be the one to do the hard ome here. Yes Bruno and Alex came to an end. after three beautiful years, we decided to came apart. it was a journey that we disnt expect to end like this but I wouldt have change for nothinf in thia world. we have beautiful unique memories that we aill feel blessed forever. so yall can stop asking what happened. its love, all the good things ends. now its time to focus on Lobo and Alex Ink seperataly, I mean can you imagine doing a scene together in the future ğŸ˜ğŸ˜³
please share love and see this as the better path for our own happiness!
